column5: This house has quite the farmhouse charm. Two blocks from the beach and Pleasure Pier. You can enjoy the gulf breeze from the master bedroom balcony and watch the fireworks on the beach. It is located five minutes from the Historical Strand and cruise ship terminal. This house was built in 2016. The interior has 42 in. cabinets, granite countertops, and wood floors.
column8: Centrally Located, walking distance to beach.
